description: Commands to manage Azure Monitor workspace integrations of a Grafana instance.

commands.name: az grafana integrations monitor add
commands.summary: Link an Azure Monitor workspace to a Grafana instance.
commands.syntax:
az grafana integrations monitor add --monitor-name
                                    --monitor-resource-group-name
                                    --name
                                    [--resource-group]
                                    [--skip-role-assignments {false, true}]

commands.name: az grafana integrations monitor delete
commands.summary: Unlink an Azure Monitor workspace from a Grafana instance.
commands.syntax:
az grafana integrations monitor delete --monitor-name
                                       --monitor-resource-group-name
                                       --name
                                       [--resource-group]
                                       [--skip-role-assignments {false, true}]

commands.name: az grafana integrations monitor list
commands.summary: List all Azure Monitor workspaces linked to a Grafana instance.
